response.overview: A teenage hustler and a young man obsessed with alien abductions cross paths, together discovering a horrible, liberating truth.
response.tagline: Two boys. One can't remember. The other can't forget.
response.title: Mysterious Skin

titles.title: ミステリアス・スキン
